AUTH_NOT_ADMIN: You do not have admin permissions
ORG_LAST_OWNER: There must be at least one owner in the organization
USER_EMAIL_CONFLICT: A user with this email already exists
USER_ALREADY_MEMBER: User is already a member of this organization
USER_CANNOT_DELETE_SELF: You cannot delete your own account
SEASON_INVALID_RANGE: Season start must be before or equal to season end
CONTRACT_ALREADY_ACTIVE: Player already has an active contract in this season
GAME_TEAMS_IDENTICAL: Home and away team must be different
GAME_TEAMS_NOT_IN_DIVISION: Both teams must belong to the selected division
GAME_NOT_EDITABLE: Completed or cancelled games cannot be edited
GAME_ALREADY_FINALIZED: Game is already completed or cancelled
GAME_LINEUPS_MISSING: Both teams must have a lineup
GAME_CANNOT_CANCEL: Only scheduled games can be cancelled
GAME_CANNOT_REOPEN: Only completed or cancelled games can be reopened
GAME_DIVISION_SEASON_MISMATCH: Division does not belong to the selected season
GAME_ROUND_DIVISION_MISMATCH: Round does not belong to the selected division
GAME_INSUFFICIENT_TEAMS: At least two teams are required to generate fixtures
PAGE_INVALID_SLUG: The title does not produce a valid URL slug
PAGE_NESTING_LIMIT: Sub-pages can only be nested one level deep
PAGE_STATIC_TITLE_LOCKED: The title of a static page cannot be changed
VENUE_IN_USE: Venue cannot be deleted (has assigned games)
